text: Rajgram Vivekananda Hindu Vidyalay is a co-ed school located in Bankura city in West Bengal, India. It is affiliated with the West Bengal Board of Secondary Education. ==Affiliation== The school is affiliated with the West Bengal Board of Secondary Education. ==See also== *Bankura Zilla School ==References== Category:High schools and secondary schools in West Bengal Category:Schools in Bankura district Category:1940 establishments in India Category:Educational institutions established in 1940
title: Rajgram Vivekananda Hindu Vidyalaya
